answer:
Fluviral is an injected inactivated influenza vaccine (flu shot) and you can find a list of the ingredients for all approved vaccines in Canada here. Read more about vaccine ingredients and their safety here. Learn more about influenza vaccines here.
Each year, the World Health Organization recommends which influenza virus strains to include in the vaccines. For the 2018/19 influenza season Fluviral protects agaisnt:

		A/Michigan/45/2015 (H1N1)pdm09-like virus

		A/Singapore/INFIMH-16-0019/2016 (H3N2)-like virus

		B/Colorado/06/2017-like virus
Immunization Nurse

## Fluviral is an injected inactivated influenza vaccine (flu shot) and you can find a list of the ingredients for all approved vaccines in Canada here.

Read more about vaccine ingredients and their safety here.
Learn more about influenza vaccines here.
Each year, the World Health Organization recommends which influenza virus strains to include in the vaccines.
For the 2018/19 influenza season Fluviral protects agaisnt:A/Michigan/45/2015 (H1N1)pdm09-like virus

		A/Singapore/INFIMH-16-0019/2016 (H3N2)-like virus

		B/Colorado/06/2017-like virus
